## HandlerService.get() method

Returns the handler for the provided ID or undefined if not found.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(id: string | {
        intentId: string;
    }): Promise<Handler> | Promise<undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string \| { intentId: string; } | Either the ID as a string or an object that has the ID under intentId |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| Promise&lt;undefined&gt;
